description.value: The natural world can be scary to those not used to it-and you make it scarier still. If you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] from a creature, you can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] it without losing your hidden condition-imitating the sounds of strange beasts or causing the foliage to rustle menacingly. When you do so, you don't take a penalty to your check if the target doesn't understand your language.
